short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export all URLs and their related page numbers from PDF files with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PDF Link Extractor is a Chrome extension designed specifically for handling links within PDF files. Whether you want a quick glance at all the URLs within a PDF, or you need to export these links along with their corresponding pages into a neatly organized CSV file, PDF Link Extractor has got you covered.

Our extension is not just an ordinary tool, it's an efficiency booster that makes dealing with PDFs easier than ever. 

üôÇHow it works:
1. Drag your PDF file into the designated area.
2. The system will automatically extract all URLs from the PDF.
3. Copy all URLs instantly or export them along with their corresponding pages to a CSV file.

üîíData Privacy:
We highly value the trust of our users and are committed to the security and privacy of your data. PDF Link Extractor operates in full compliance with all privacy regulations and guidelines, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).

Our process is local, not storing or accessing your data at any point. The extraction of URLs from your PDFs happens solely on your device. We do not share any data with third parties, respecting your privacy at all times.
